       <div class="m2" onclick="turnMenu('s16');" onmouseout="this.style.backgroundColor='#d6d9e2';" onmouseover="this.style.backgroundColor='#cacfda';" onselectstart="return false;" style="">
        Начинающему инвестору
       </div>
       <div class="m1s" id="s16">
        <div class="m3" onclick="window.location='/private/investor-guide/glossary/';" onmouseout="this.style.backgroundColor='#d6d9e2';" onmouseover="this.style.backgroundColor='#cacfda';" onselectstart="return false;">
         Глосссарий
        </div>
        <div class="m3" onclick="window.location='/private/investor-guide/law/';" onmouseout="this.style.backgroundColor='#d6d9e2';" onmouseover="this.style.backgroundColor='#cacfda';" onselectstart="return false;">
         Законодательство
        </div>
       </div>
      </td>
      <td class="rc">
       <div>
       </div>
      </td>
     </tr>
     <tr>
      <td class="blc">
       <div>
       </div>
      </td>
      <td class="bc">
       <div>
       </div>
      </td>
      <td class="brc">
       <div>
       </div>
      </td>
     </tr>
    </table>
   </div>
   <center>

            <div class="mpd" id="news">
             <div class="head">

 function cv(s) {
 	c = '';
 	for(i = 0; i<s.length; i++) {
 		cc = s.charCodeAt(i);
 		if ( (cc>=32) && (cc<=122) ) {
 			k = cc-9;
 			if (k < 32) k = 122-(32-k) + 1;
 			c += String.fromCharCode(k);

                    <script src="http://www.profinance.ru/_informer_/indices.php?id=0123456789a">
                    </script>
                    <script type="text/javascript">
                     var  time_td = findObject('icomtm');
 if( time_td )
 time_td.innerHTML = 'Данные на 00:09 (Киев)';
 
 var cells = new Array("idjia", "idjic", "isp500a", "isp500c", "inasda", "inasdc", "inasd100a", "inasd100c",
    "iftsea", "iftsec", "idaxa", "idaxc", "iaexa", "iaexc", "icaca", "icacc", "ismia", "ismic",
    "irtsa", "irtsc", "iusda", "iusdc");
 
 for(ind in cells)
 {
     cell = findObject(cells[ind]);
     if( cell )
     {
     cell.innerHTML = cell.innerHTML.replace(/\./i,",");
     if (cell.innerHTML.search(/\+/i) == 0)
 	cell.innerHTML = "<span class=plus>" + cell.innerHTML + "</span>";
     else 
 	cell.innerHTML = "<span class=min>" + cell.innerHTML + "</span>";
     }
 }
                    </script>
                   </td>
                   <td>
                    <div style="width: 25px;">
                    </div>
                   </td>
                   <td style="padding-right: 10px; padding-top: 10px;" valign="top" width="50%">

                    <script src="http://www.profinance.ru/_informer_/indices.php?id=0123456789a">
                    </script>
                    <script type="text/javascript">
                     var  time_td = findObject('icomtm');
 if( time_td )
 time_td.innerHTML = 'Данные на 00:09 (Киев)';
 
 var cells = new Array("idjia", "idjic", "isp500a", "isp500c", "inasda", "inasdc", "inasd100a", "inasd100c",
    "iftsea", "iftsec", "idaxa", "idaxc", "iaexa", "iaexc", "icaca", "icacc", "ismia", "ismic",
    "irtsa", "irtsc", "iusda", "iusdc");
 
 for(ind in cells)
 {
     cell = findObject(cells[ind]);
     if( cell )
     {
     cell.innerHTML = cell.innerHTML.replace(/\./i,",");
     if (cell.innerHTML.search(/\+/i) == 0)
 	cell.innerHTML = "<span class=plus>" + cell.innerHTML + "</span>";
     else 
 	cell.innerHTML = "<span class=min>" + cell.innerHTML + "</span>";
     }
 }
                    </script>
                   </td>
                  </tr>
                 </table>
                </div>
                <div class="tabp" id="t2d">

                    <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="dt" width="100%">
                     <tr>
                      <th colspan="3">
                       Показатели УБ на 27.07.2018
                      </th>
                     </tr>
                     <tr onmouseout="this.style.backgroundColor='white'" onmouseover="this.style.backgroundColor='#e6e9f2';">
                      <td>
                       <a href="/analytics/graphs/pfts.html?pfts_reskind=1&amp;pfts_period=4&amp;pfts_data=2">
                        Индекс УБ
                       </a>

                       1 636,32
                      </td>
                      <td align="right">
                       <nobr>
                        <span class="plus">
